summary: The diff only updates project_state.json metadata; it does not replace/regenerate the favicon or apple-touch-icon assets, nor does it confirm index.html references. REQ-4 is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing favicon and apple-touch-icon static assets with versions derived from the user-uploaded image (image-3.png), keeping the same filenames and paths currently referenced by frontend/index.html.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes were made to the referenced asset files under /assets/generated/, and there are no modifications shown for frontend/index.html to ensure it continues to reference the required paths.
evidence: project_state.json (only metadata updated; no asset or index.html changes shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/new_feature_requests entries (e.g., AR-4/AR-5) without implementing the actual favicon/apple-touch-icon asset replacements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for regenerating/replacing specific static image assets and preserving index.html references; modifying only project_state.json is not part of the requested deliverable.
